name: - Pipe Bobomb -
author: Emperor Doom
description: Bob-ombs are living, moving mechanical bombs with eyes, feet, and a wind-up key in the back. They are generic enemies who first appeared in Super Mario Bros. 2, and have appeared in nearly every Mario game since then. Their appearance, intelligence, and status in relation to Mario differ widely from game to game. They are usually either blue or black, but some variations are pink or red. They will also flash red and sometimes make beeping sounds if they are about to explode.

name: Makise Kurisu - Nick (v2a2 - Testing Version)
author: Vanya (rigging) - Kakomiki (Model Creator)
description:
Current Skin Version: v2a2 - Testing Version (November 10th 2016)

The following mod replaces Nick from the Left 4 Dead 2 crew with Makise Kurisu from 'Steins;Gate', mod comes with custom HUD Icons, Jiggle Bones and First Person Arms

Credits:
Kakomiki - Original model creator, model taken from MMD
Devostator - Ported the model from MMD to another game (from which then I ported it here)
Vanya - Ported and rigged the model into Left 4 Dead 2, made HUD icons and first person arms (original artwork credits belong to their original authors)
gkuo88 - Taught me how to add jigglebones into the model

name: - Pipe Bobomb -
author: Emperor Doom
description: Bob-ombs are living, moving mechanical bombs with eyes, feet, and a wind-up key in the back. They are generic enemies who first appeared in Super Mario Bros. 2, and have appeared in nearly every Mario game since then. Their appearance, intelligence, and status in relation to Mario differ widely from game to game. They are usually either blue or black, but some variations are pink or red. They will also flash red and sometimes make beeping sounds if they are about to explode.

name: Makise Kurisu - Nick (v2a2 - Testing Version)
author: Vanya (rigging) - Kakomiki (Model Creator)
description:
Current Skin Version: v2a2 - Testing Version (November 10th 2016)

The following mod replaces Nick from the Left 4 Dead 2 crew with Makise Kurisu from 'Steins;Gate', mod comes with custom HUD Icons, Jiggle Bones and First Person Arms

Credits:
Kakomiki - Original model creator, model taken from MMD
Devostator - Ported the model from MMD to another game (from which then I ported it here)
Vanya - Ported and rigged the model into Left 4 Dead 2, made HUD icons and first person arms (original artwork credits belong to their original authors)
gkuo88 - Taught me how to add jigglebones into the model
